sentences.cn: 反战示威者们扰乱了辩论。

sentences.en: Asked a thorough Chen has to disrupt the psychological line of defense.
sentences.cn: 这一问,彻底打乱了陈某的心理防线.

sentences.en: But we must move quickly to disrupt all communications down there.
sentences.cn: 但是必须马上切断所有同那卜星的通讯.

sentences.en: China's colossal Three Gorges Dam project continues to disrupt lives.
sentences.cn: 中国规模庞大的三峡大坝工程继续干扰着人们的生活.

sentences.en: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.cn: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

sentences.en: Disrupt public order or adversely affect good social customs.
sentences.cn: 妨害公共秩序或善良风俗.

sentences.en: Don't get Unforeseen circumstances will disrupt your daily routine.
sentences.cn: 然突出其来的事情会打乱你的日常工作.

sentences.en: Enteric anastomoses may disrupt and produce a fistula and peritonitis.
sentences.cn: 小肠吻合可能破裂并产生瘘管和腹膜炎.

sentences.en: I'm not going to disrupt our religious services just to accommodate a bunch of lousy atheists.
sentences.cn: 我可不为了迁就几个不信上帝的家伙,就把咱们的宗教仪式给破坏掉.

sentences.en: If we disrupt your ambition and your commitment, we disrupt your success.
sentences.cn: 如果我们妨碍了你们的雄心和热情, 我们就是在妨碍你们成功的道路.

sentences.en: Please don't disrupt the class with your bad humor.
sentences.cn: 请不要用你低俗的幽默来扰乱课堂秩序.

sentences.en: Senna says he is not out to maim, just disrupt a game.
sentences.cn: 塞纳说他并非为了使人受伤而犯规, 她只是想中断比赛.

sentences.en: Terrorists attempt to disrupt the Atlanta Olympics by kidnapping the U.
sentences.cn: 模仿《终极警探》剧情架构的火爆动作片,在似曾相识的故事中仍努力搞出了吸引观众的紧张气氛,一波接一波的动作场面亦拍得不俗.

sentences.en: The key question was whether they would stand aside or would disrupt the elections.
sentences.cn: 关键问题是他们会袖手旁观还是会扰乱选举。

sentences.en: They couldn't speak out loud, because any movement would disrupt the scanning.
sentences.cn: 他们不能大声说出来, 因为任何的移动都会中断扫描.

sentences.en: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.cn: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.en: Viral replication can be blocked by antiviral drugs that disrupt DNA.
sentences.cn: 通过抗病毒药物破坏DNA来抑制病毒的复制.

sentences.en: Will International Rules on Subsidies Disrupt the World Trading System?
sentences.cn: 关于补贴的国际规则是否会打乱世界贸易体系?

words.tran_cn: 破坏的；分裂性的；制造混乱的
破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱

trans.tran_en: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

trans.tran_cn: 使中断； 使分裂； 使瓦解
trans.tran_en: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems
